extendedInfo.description: Glist (Grocery and Shopping List) is an easy-to-use yet powerful app. It is a great tool when it is time to go shopping or you need to keep track of your ToDo items.Features:* multiple shopping/ToDo lists* quantity* send list in email & SMS* list import from SMS* attach images to list items* home screen app widget for shopping lists

reviews.title: handy app
reviews.comment: its handy if you want to make a simple list because you cant add much detail. LOVE being able to add pics. I would like to be able to add the store name, price, or even just a note.
reviews.author: Melissa Leonhardt

reviews.title: Just what I needed
reviews.comment: This app is perfect, and not just for shopping. I use it for wishlists, to do lists, to keep track of bills, and even keeping track of my hrs at work. This app is easy to use and hasnt had a single glitch since I got it. No suggestions here...you guys (and gals) nailed it on the head
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app. I wish the pictures showed up as little icons next to the item. Quick and easy and I\'m probably not even utilizing all the functions :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does wot it says, but the widget is just yellow & square, pretty lame & ugly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply good
reviews.comment: Not flashy, but a small file size and simple interface make this my choice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I wish it had sort options. Only checked items for example. Hide when unchecked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I loved GList
reviews.comment: It was my favorite list app, but here\'s what would happen...I\'ve got a list, I\'m checking things off, I long-tap to edit one of the items and when I click okay to the edit and go back to the list, all of my check marks are gone. BAD THING TO DO! I emailed the developers a month ago and never got a reply. :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a wonderful app! My persistence has definitely paid off. The more I use it, the more I learn. Job well done!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Need a menu for fixing list but great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App, but so-so icon
reviews.comment: I like Glist a lot. It is very handy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, it\'s simple, but also a little dull.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Extremely easy to use and effective
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Force close on 7500L, every time you try to add pic. Ok otherwise. Very basic barebones UI.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Why no comments with such a high rating? ???
reviews.author: A Google User
